Text: O amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, me̩ gbo̩ o̩la kʼata one̩ ako̩ me̩,
todu uko̩-o̩la o̩me̩me̩le̩ nadu ñw me̩-i:
Todu omi onugo chʼo̩ma ñw ata-mi ge̩,
oñ ata-mi ko̩ mi, oñ i ka ñw mi kakini,
fʼibe ne̩, fʼoji e̩wñ ema ne̩; e̩ ki gbenyo̩ n,
E̩ ki hiʼu tinyo̩ n, tak owñ adejutʼuwe̩;
Uchane̩ ibe che, fʼibe ne̩,
Hi owñ dago, tak owñ adʼuwe̩ nyo̩gba;
I adʼuloko uto̩ dʼuwe̩ oji;
O̩ma-mi, gbo̩ ke, kʼe̩ mʼo̩la kʼu naka gba,
U te̩takʼuwe̩ lʼo̩na ibe;
E̩gba kʼe̩ lo e̩re̩-we̩ agwoma n;
E̩ ki gwo̩nyu o̩la ku ma kʼone̩ gaga, e̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ n;
E̩ ki gudu tʼikpa ame̩ne̩bibi n,
Bʼane̩ te̩ ñw u; e̩ ki lale ugbo kʼi de̩ n;
Todu ma lolu n, chai e̩gba ku ma fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ che ta;
Todu uje̩wñ ku ma je̩ chʼe̩wñ bibi eche
Ikpa e̩no̩kpakpa dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩jo̩ ki añwa,
O̩na ame̩ne̩bibi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩chubi;
O̩ma-mi, netirʼo̩la-mi;
I ki kwo bʼuwe̩ eju te̩ n;
Todu iñmi i che ñw abo ku ma fʼu li,
E̩do̩-we̩ ede ki tʼo̩gba e̩wñ du kʼe̩ de̩;
Mʼo̩la e̩dalo̩ du kwo bʼalu-we̩ te̩,
Fʼeju gwanyi e̩wñ ki dʼo̩gba o̩gba,
Fʼibe tʼikpa ugbo kʼe̩re̩-we̩ ale,
E̩ ki na tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n;
